item.title: Rubbish men leaving bin on road - not putting it back behind fence, 15th January
item.description:
Hello, The rubbish men have not been returning the bin behind our fence. When this happens rubbish collects next to it from people walking by. We cant move it ourselves as the wheels are locked. Please can you ask them to move it back when they empty. Thx

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darnley Road, Hackney, London

item.title: The thousands of Styrofoam Balls are NOT Resolved, 15th January
item.description:
